## classifyChanges() function

Classifies a set of changes and computes the overall release type.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function classifyChanges(
  changes: Change[],
  totalSymbolsOld: number,
  totalSymbolsNew: number,
): ClassificationResult
```
